data.quote: Consensus with yourself begets strength.
data.author: Stefan Zeromski

data.quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: If you're sure that you haven't got any reason to live or go on, the point is to search for it.
data.author: S.h.~

data.quote: Love between the people should be sowed like the golden cereal, although the cockle of hate shall be snatched and trampled.
data.author: Stefan Zeromski

data.quote: Worries teach us feeling the relievement, just like the happiness does.
data.author: Stefan Zeromski

data.quote: [...] Even the light can be forced to lie [...]
data.author: Joseph Conrad

data.quote: Happiness is just like the echo, which responses when we give ourselves.
data.author: Phil Bosmans

data.quote: Don't try to be strong by all means. The strenght is the thing that separates us from the other people.
data.author: Wieslaw Mysliwski

data.quote: You cannot enter the maze from inside, it must be walked from the very beginning.
data.author: Joanna Lamparska

data.quote: You say that you can - so you can. You say that you can't - and so you can't. Choose wisely.
data.author: Seung Sahn

data.quote: The fact that i'm alive itself is an excuse good enough to do everything.
data.author: Marek Hlasko

data.quote: Life isn't about surviving the storm, it's about dancing in it's rain.
data.author: Richard Paul Evans

data.quote: Work is the escape from realizing the passage of time
data.author: Zbigniew Wodecki

data.quote: That's what trust is all about [...] You're never know.
data.author: Lauren Oliver

data.quote: Life's too short for long-term blames.
data.author: Elon Musk

data.quote: Do not criticize something, until you try it.
data.author: Jojo Moyes

data.quote: Sometimes we need those bad days to look at those good ones from the better perspective.
data.author: (Anonym)

data.quote: If you're not permitted to make bad and unresponsible choices, you aren't free.
data.author: Jacob Hornberger

data.quote: Live is too short to be little.
data.author: Benjamin Disraeli

data.quote: The worst moments in life are ones when nothing's happening, because that means something bad'll come up imminently.
data.author: Terry Pratchett
